title: A Private War
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Kamala Films, Thunder Road, Denver and Delilah Productions, Savvy Media Holdings, Michael O'Connor, Arash Amel, Matthew Heineman, Matthew George, Marissa McMahon, Sophie Becher, Charlize Theron and Basil Iwanyk
headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2018
brief_description: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontlines of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

constellations_other.name: Cities under siege
constellations_other.description: The Syrian Civil War is an ongoing conflict that is arguably the most documented in history, with images and videos captured by journalists, activists, combatants and victims.
